title: Sports Reporter - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Reporter Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for the coverage of local sports in the readership area, some outdoor/wildlife sports stories and an occasional general news assignment.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
